translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真意を掴みかねて、伝令はルメイを見上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to grasp the true intention, the messenger looked up at Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「徹底的に被害を拡大させれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we thoroughly increase the damage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やつらも助けに戻らざるをえまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they'll have no choice but to come back to help."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それは……そう、かもしれませんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-That may be... true, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦を中止し、呼び戻した方が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be better to stop the operation and call them back..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「却下だ。くだらん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rejected. Nonsense."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歯牙にも掛けず、ルメイは一言で切り捨てた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without giving it a second thought, Lumei dismissed it with a single word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらが苦しいからと、攻め手を止めてどうする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What good is it to stop the attack just because we're struggling?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局、一方的に攻められるだけだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, we'll only be attacked one-sidedly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「攻めるのだ。殺すのだ。なんなら首都まで襲え。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Attack. Kill. If you can, even strike the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺し続けろ、やつらが音を上げるまでな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keep killing until they scream for mercy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイの瞳は異常な光を帯びて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei's eyes glowed with an unnatural light,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺しの悦びに炯々と輝いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shining brilliantly with the joy of killing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両軍の作戦開始から、六時間。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Six hours since both armies began their operations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン東部、モルオル村――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morol Village, eastern Helmann—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ……ここももぬけの殻です、隊長」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... This place is empty too, Captain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええいくそ……またか。どうなってる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it... Again? What's going on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確かに、出入りする村人を見たというのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was certain I saw villagers coming and going..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「罠……なのでしょうか……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this... a trap...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わ、我々に……帰る場所は…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: D-Do we... have anywhere to return to...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「噂だと、我々の陣地を人間どもの主力が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rumor has it their main forces have

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり深くまで襲撃してるらしいですし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invaded deep into our positions..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、案ずるな。ルメイ大将軍が、そう易々と……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Don't worry. General Lumei wouldn't so easily..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おごっ……うぐあああああああっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... Ughhhhhhh...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長の声を、遠くからの絶叫が遮った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A far-off scream interrupted the monster captain's voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どっ、毒だーーーー！　い、井戸水に毒が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Po-Poison! The well water is poisoned...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ、また……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, again...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「み、水や食い物に触れるなと言ったろう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I told you not to touch the water or food!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそっ、小賢しい真似を……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it, such cunning tricks...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「く、い、いったい何と戦ってるんだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wh-What exactly are we fighting against,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺たちは…………！」
ダウンフォール作戦は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Downfall operation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当初の予定を崩されつつあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was being disrupted from its original plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アサシン達が、あるいは魔軍の行軍を滞らせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Assassins and others slowed the demon army's march,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるいは住民に擬態して避難済みの村に引き込み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or disguised themselves as villagers to lure them into evacuated villages,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手を尽くして作戦を妨害する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: using every means to sabotage the operation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その隙に小さな村々の住民は都市や砦に駆け込ませ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that gap, villagers from small settlements fled to cities and forts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それらは固く門を閉ざして立てこもった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which tightly closed their gates and barricaded themselves in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防衛の兵力も準備も充分ではないが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though defense forces and preparations were insufficient,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日保たせればいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was enough to hold out for one day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堅牢な計画都市の多い、ヘルマンだからこそ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This was possible precisely because Helmann had many well-fortified planned cities.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可能な策であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a feasible strategy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……こんなところね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's the situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大部分の民は、拠点が落ちるまでは無事でしょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Most of the people will be safe until the strongholds fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダウンフォール作戦は、これで只の攻城戦」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Downfall operation has now become just a siege."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あとは突撃部隊の出来次第、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now it depends on the assault troops' performance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アサシンの方々にはそちらの援護もお願いしたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I would also like the assassins to support that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やれやれ、みんな人使いが荒いったらないわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief, everyone sure is demanding when it comes to assigning tasks."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「徹底的に被害を拡大させれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we thoroughly increase the damage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やつらも助けに戻らざるをえまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they'll have no choice but to come back to help."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それは……そう、かもしれませんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-That may be... true, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦を中止し、呼び戻した方が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be better to stop the operation and call them back..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「却下だ。くだらん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rejected. Nonsense."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歯牙にも掛けず、ルメイは一言で切り捨てた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without giving it a second thought, Lumei dismissed it with a single word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらが苦しいからと、攻め手を止めてどうする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What good is it to stop the attack just because we're struggling?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局、一方的に攻められるだけだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, we'll only be attacked one-sidedly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「攻めるのだ。殺すのだ。なんなら首都まで襲え。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Attack. Kill. If you can, even strike the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺し続けろ、やつらが音を上げるまでな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keep killing until they scream for mercy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイの瞳は異常な光を帯びて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei's eyes glowed with an unnatural light,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺しの悦びに炯々と輝いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shining brilliantly with the joy of killing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両軍の作戦開始から、六時間。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Six hours since both armies began their operations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン東部、モルオル村――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morol Village, eastern Helmann—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ……ここももぬけの殻です、隊長」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... This place is empty too, Captain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええいくそ……またか。どうなってる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it... Again? What's going on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確かに、出入りする村人を見たというのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was certain I saw villagers coming and going..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「罠……なのでしょうか……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this... a trap...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わ、我々に……帰る場所は…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: D-Do we... have anywhere to return to...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「噂だと、我々の陣地を人間どもの主力が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rumor has it their main forces have

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり深くまで襲撃してるらしいですし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invaded deep into our positions..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、案ずるな。ルメイ大将軍が、そう易々と……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Don't worry. General Lumei wouldn't so easily..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おごっ……うぐあああああああっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... Ughhhhhhh...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長の声を、遠くからの絶叫が遮った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A far-off scream interrupted the monster captain's voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どっ、毒だーーーー！　い、井戸水に毒が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Po-Poison! The well water is poisoned...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ、また……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, again...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「み、水や食い物に触れるなと言ったろう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I told you not to touch the water or food!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそっ、小賢しい真似を……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it, such cunning tricks...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「く、い、いったい何と戦ってるんだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wh-What exactly are we fighting against,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺たちは…………！」
ダウンフォール作戦は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Downfall operation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当初の予定を崩されつつあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was being disrupted from its original plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アサシン達が、あるいは魔軍の行軍を滞らせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Assassins and others slowed the demon army's march,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるいは住民に擬態して避難済みの村に引き込み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or disguised themselves as villagers to lure them into evacuated villages,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手を尽くして作戦を妨害する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: using every means to sabotage the operation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その隙に小さな村々の住民は都市や砦に駆け込ませ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that gap, villagers from small settlements fled to cities and forts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それらは固く門を閉ざして立てこもった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which tightly closed their gates and barricaded themselves in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防衛の兵力も準備も充分ではないが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though defense forces and preparations were insufficient,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日保たせればいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was enough to hold out for one day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堅牢な計画都市の多い、ヘルマンだからこそ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This was possible precisely because Helmann had many well-fortified planned cities.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可能な策であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a feasible strategy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……こんなところね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's the situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大部分の民は、拠点が落ちるまでは無事でしょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Most of the people will be safe until the strongholds fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダウンフォール作戦は、これで只の攻城戦」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Downfall operation has now become just a siege."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あとは突撃部隊の出来次第、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now it depends on the assault troops' performance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アサシンの方々にはそちらの援護もお願いしたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I would also like the assassins to support that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やれやれ、みんな人使いが荒いったらないわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief, everyone sure is demanding when it comes to assigning tasks."
